viewData.name: Lenovo 15.6" ThinkPad E580 Notebook
viewData.short_description: Buy Lenovo 15.6" ThinkPad E580 Notebook featuring 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5-7200U Dual-Core, 8GB DDR4 | 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Anti-Glare Display. Review Lenovo E580
viewData.long_description: The 15.6" ThinkPad E580 Notebook from Lenovo is designed for business purposes, featuring the performance, security, and portability users need. Specs-wise, it's powered by a 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5-7200U Dual-Core processor, 8GB of DDR4 RAM, and a 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD. Should you need more room, you can install an additional storage drive, attach external storage solutions using its USB ports, as well as quickly offload data to other devices with its microSD card reader.  Its 15.6" display, driven by integrated Intel HD graphics, features a 1920 x 1080 resolution for crisp and clear HD playback. Moreover, it has an HDMI port that you can use for connecting a display for larger viewing and enhanced multitasking. Other integrated features include a fingerprint reader, Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac), Gigabit Ethernet LAN, Bluetooth 4.1, a webcam, a microphone, speakers, and an audio in/out jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro.
